data.name: EnergyOnlyBoxText
data.value: It takes no more than 21 days to switch to us and we’ll keep you informed at every step.

data.name: BroadbandBundleBoxText
data.value: Your energy supply and phone and broadband will be switched over to us within 21 days. We’ll keep you informed at every step.

data.name: CrossSell2TextBroadband

data.name: CrossSellTextHES
data.value: We offer boiler and heating cover with parts and labour included, a 24/7 emergency helpline, and call-outs for emergency repairs 24 hours a day.

data.name: ModuleText
data.value: Get access to tickets for The SSE Arena, Wembley, The SSE Hydro and The SSE Arena, Belfast up to 48 hours before they go on general sale!

data.name: Paragraph1
data.value: Thank you – we’ve received your application for the {0} {1} with SSE.

data.name: Paragraph2
data.value: Your Welcome pack will include your confirmation of contract, tariff information, terms & conditions and cancellation form. Your right to change your mind within 14 days is from the day after the date you sign up with us. Your confirmation of contract will tell you how to cancel.

data.name: Paragraph3
data.value: Confirmation of your Direct Debit will be sent within 3 working days or 10 days prior to collection.

data.name: StepsPara1
data.value: We’ll send you a confirmation email shortly.

data.name: StepsPara2
data.value: Got a question? You’ll find answers to common questions on our

data.name: StepsPara2Part2
data.value: , or

data.name: StepsPara3
data.value: Redeem your £11.50 SSE fibre broadband offer with the link we’ll email you within 2 to 5 days.

data.name: SmartMessage
data.value: Your tariff needs a smart meter. We’ll be in touch shortly to let you book your installation.

data.name: HesBundleBoxText
data.value: Your energy supply will switch to us within 21 days. We'll keep you informed at every step. Your heating cover starts on the next working day after your energy switch date.

data.name: CrossSellHeaderBroadband
data.value: Switch to SSE's Frustration-Free Broadband

data.name: CrossSellLinkAltBroadband
data.value: Find out more about our broadband

data.name: CrossSellLinkTextBroadband
data.value: Find out more

data.name: CrossSellTextBroadband
data.value: We offer broadband with a promise of zero price hikes during your 18-month contract, unlimited downloads and no upfront broadband charges – and you can even leave for free with our Happiness Guarantee.

data.name: WhatHappensNext2Broadband
data.value: We’ll then email you Welcome packs with details about your energy and broadband products, including terms and conditions.

data.name: WhatHappensNext2Energy
data.value: We’ll then email you a Welcome pack with details about your product, including terms and conditions.

data.name: WhatHappensNext2Hes
data.value: We’ll then email you a Welcome pack with details about your energy product, including terms and conditions.

data.name: WhatHappensNext3Hes
data.value: You’ll receive your Welcome pack with details about your heating cover by post.
